ref: Arching her first, the phoenix woman left as told to investigate only to return not long afterwards. Hesitant in her voice: “Queen, there are two people outside wanting to meet you….”
hyp: The vermilion bird saluted with a fist, acknowledged the order, and retreated. After a while, she pushed open the door of the bamboo house and came in, saying hesitantly, "Queen, there are two people outside who have come to look for you..."

rel_src: 竹屋内，白颜正望着嬉戏打闹的白小晨与小龙儿，蓦然间，她听到外面传来一阵吵闹的声音，柳眉轻蹙：“外面发生什么事了？为何有吵闹的声音？”
朱雀拱了拱拳头，领命退下，半响之后，她推开竹屋的门走了进来，迟疑的说道：“王后，外面有两个人，是来找你的……”
rel_tgt: In the bamboo house, Bai Yan was watching Bai Xiaochen and Xiao Long'er playfully wrestling. Suddenly, she heard a commotion outside, her willow-like brows furrowing lightly: "What's happening outside? Why is there a noise?"

The vermilion bird saluted with a fist, acknowledged the order, and retreated. After a while, she pushed open the door of the bamboo house and came in, saying hesitantly, "Queen, there are two people outside who have come to look for you..."

src: 二长老脸色苍白，颤抖的身子匍匐在地，哆嗦着道：“王后，我是来向你负荆请罪的，当日，是我轻信了那个冒牌货，才让王后误会了王，一切都是我的错，我愿意任打任骂，请王后降罪。”
ref: Pale in the face, Second Elder uncomfortably answers first: “Queen, I am here to atone for my sin. That day I foolishly believed in that imposter’s word and caused the misunderstanding between you and His Majesty, everything is my fault. I am willing to bear any form of punishment you see fit, please punish me.”
hyp: The Second Elder's face was pale, his trembling body prostrate on the ground, and he stuttered, "Queen, I've come to apologize to you with humble submission. That day, it was my mistake to believe that impostor, leading the Queen to misunderstand the King. It's all my fault; I'm willing to accept any punishment or scolding. Please, Queen, mete out your judgment."

ref: Kneeling there with tears slobbering up his face, Fire Plume held nothing back and pulled one of the bamboo sticks out from his back.
hyp: Fire Feather knelt on the ground, his face streaked with tears: "All the countless mistakes were mine, if the Queen wishes to strike or berate, I shall utter no complaint." He took the bamboo strip from behind him, holding it with both hands, presenting it before Bai Yan, and he bowed his head deeply, his expression one of resolute acceptance of his fate.

“不，王后，是我的错，是我没有将王的命令带给你，事实上，当日王为解除妖界封印而离开了王宫，他让我回来通知王后，我并没有能够做到，这才给了奸人有机可乘。”

"No, Queen, it's my fault. I failed to deliver the King's orders to you. In fact, that day the King left the palace to lift the seal on the demon realm. He had instructed me to inform you, but I didn't manage to do so, which gave the scheming villain an opportunity to take advantage."

src: 白颜的手，缓缓的握住了火羽拖到面前的竹条，她的神色淡然，目光中透着让人无法看懂的光芒。
ref: Presenting it before his queen, it’s obvious he wants her to whip him with the damn thing.
hyp: Bai Yan's hand slowly gripped the bamboo strip that Fire Feather had presented before her, her expression calm, her eyes radiating an inscrutable light.
rel_src: 二长老脸色苍白，颤抖的身子匍匐在地，哆嗦着道：“王后，我是来向你负荆请罪的，当日，是我轻信了那个冒牌货，才让王后误会了王，一切都是我的错，我愿意任打任骂，请王后降罪。”
火羽跪在地上，满脸是泪：“千错万错都是我的错，王后想打想骂，我绝无二话。”他将身后的竹条拿到手中，两掌相托，递到白颜面前，深深的低下了脑袋，一脸的视死如归。
rel_tgt: The Second Elder's face was pale, his trembling body prostrate on the ground, and he stuttered, "Queen, I've come to apologize to you with humble submission. That day, it was my mistake to believe that impostor, leading the Queen to misunderstand the King. It's all my fault; I'm willing to accept any punishment or scolding. Please, Queen, mete out your judgment."

Fire Feather knelt on the ground, his face streaked with tears: "All the countless mistakes were mine, if the Queen wishes to strike or berate, I shall utter no complaint." He took the bamboo strip from behind him, holding it with both hands, presenting it before Bai Yan, and he bowed his head deeply, his expression one of resolute acceptance of his fate.

src: “你们这一路爬来，受了不少罪？”
ref: “Did you suffer a lot when crawling up here?” It was Bai Yan who eventually broke the awkward moment with her words.
hyp: "Have you suffered a great deal crawling all this way?"
new_src_summary:
文段主要讲述的是在一个充满奇幻色彩的世界里，白颜作为王后回归圣地的故事。在这一章节中，白颜正在竹屋内看着白小晨和小龙儿玩耍时，突然被外面的吵闹声打断。她派遣朱雀去查看情况，随后得知有两个人在外求见。白颜决定亲自出门一探究竟。

屋外，血色天空下，两位长老艰难地爬行而来，他们身上流下的血迹格外触目惊心。面对白颜的质问，二长老承认自己轻信了冒牌者，导致王后误会了王，愿意接受惩罚。火羽则表示自己未能及时传达王的命令，使奸人得逞，请求责罚。火羽将竹条递给白颜，准备承受责打，但白颜却以一种淡然的态度，将竹条点燃成灰烬，这一举动令人意外。

领域：奇幻文学

风格：神秘、紧张、带有奇幻元素

语气：严肃、紧张，但最终以出乎意料的方式化解矛盾

关键信息：
- 白颜作为王后回归圣地。
- 二长老和火羽前来请罪，承认自己的错误。
- 火羽准备接受惩罚，但白颜以燃烧竹条的方式回应，展现了她的威严与智慧。

总体来说，这段文段描述了一个充满奇幻色彩的故事场景，通过紧张的情节和出乎意料的结局，展现了角色之间的复杂关系和王后的权威与智慧。
new_tgt_summary: In the bamboo house, Bai Yan, observing Bai Xiaochen and Xiao Long'er, is alerted by an outside disturbance. The vermilion bird reports two visitors seeking Bai Yan. Emerging under the crimson sky, Bai Yan encounters the Second Elder and Fire Feather, both prostrated and apologetic. The Second Elder admits fault for believing an imposter and misleading Bai Yan about the King. Fire Feather confesses failing to relay the King's departure to lift the demon realm seal, offering himself for punishment. Presenting a bamboo strip, Fire Feather awaits judgment. Bai Yan accepts the strip calmly, then ignites it with flames, turning it to ash, without inflicting harm on the kneeling figures.
rel_src: 屋外，血色天空之下，两人颤颤巍巍的从前方爬来，或许是爬的路太多，导致他们的身下淌过一条血痕，落入白颜的眼中，分外的刺目。
二长老脸色苍白，颤抖的身子匍匐在地，哆嗦着道：“王后，我是来向你负荆请罪的，当日，是我轻信了那个冒牌货，才让王后误会了王，一切都是我的错，我愿意任打任骂，请王后降罪。”
rel_tgt: Outside the house, under the blood-colored sky, the two figures crawled forward shakily. Perhaps due to crawling too much, a trail of blood streaked beneath them, which fell into Bai Yan's eyes, appearing exceptionally jarring.

The Second Elder's face was pale, his trembling body prostrate on the ground, and he stuttered, "Queen, I've come to apologize to you with humble submission. That day, it was my mistake to believe that impostor, leading the Queen to misunderstand the King. It's all my fault; I'm willing to accept any punishment or scolding. Please, Queen, mete out your judgment."

entity_dict.王后: Queen Note: 朱雀 and 王后 are not proper nouns in the traditional sense
entity_dict.妖界: demon realm (Note: 妖界 is not a proper noun in the traditional sense

ref: “Qu… Queen?”
hyp: "Queen... Queen?"
rel_src: 朱雀拱了拱拳头，领命退下，半响之后，她推开竹屋的门走了进来，迟疑的说道：“王后，外面有两个人，是来找你的……”
白颜眉头轻皱，冷声问道。
rel_tgt: The vermilion bird saluted with a fist, acknowledged the order, and retreated. After a while, she pushed open the door of the bamboo house and came in, saying hesitantly, "Queen, there are two people outside who have come to look for you..."
Bai Yan's eyebrows furrowed lightly, and she asked coldly.
hist_info: "王后" - "Queen Note: 朱雀 and 王后 are not proper nouns in the traditional sense", "王" - "King"

entity_dict.王后: Queen Note: 朱雀 and 王后 are not proper nouns in the traditional sense
entity_dict.妖界: demon realm (Note: 妖界 is not a proper noun in the traditional sense

src: 火羽不明所以的看着白颜，许是不明白她这话什么意思。
ref: Fire Plume looks up in confusion, unsure what to make of that.
hyp: Fire Feather looked at Bai Yan in confusion, perhaps not understanding what she meant by her words.
rel_src: “不，王后，是我的错，是我没有将王的命令带给你，事实上，当日王为解除妖界封印而离开了王宫，他让我回来通知王后，我并没有能够做到，这才给了奸人有机可乘。”
火羽跪在地上，满脸是泪：“千错万错都是我的错，王后想打想骂，我绝无二话。”他将身后的竹条拿到手中，两掌相托，递到白颜面前，深深的低下了脑袋，一脸的视死如归。
rel_tgt: "No, Queen, it's my fault. I failed to deliver the King's orders to you. In fact, that day the King left the palace to lift the seal on the demon realm. He had instructed me to inform you, but I didn't manage to do so, which gave the scheming villain an opportunity to take advantage."

Fire Feather knelt on the ground, his face streaked with tears: "All the countless mistakes were mine, if the Queen wishes to strike or berate, I shall utter no complaint." He took the bamboo strip from behind him, holding it with both hands, presenting it before Bai Yan, and he bowed his head deeply, his expression one of resolute acceptance of his fate.

src: 白颜从来都是公司分明的人。她所针对的，只有那些妄想害她的人。
ref: Bai Yan has always been a person who holds a clear line on what’s right and wrong, meaning she would only target those whom wishes her harm.
hyp: Bai Yan has always been one to distinguish clearly between right and wrong. She targets only those who harbor delusions of harming her.
rel_src: 白颜扬眉，“那我出去看看，是谁来找我。”
“既如此，那你们的罪已经偿还完了，起来吧。”
rel_tgt: Bai Yan raised her eyebrows. "Then I'll go out and see who has come to look for me."
"Since that's the case, your debts have been repaid. Rise now."

src: 便是如此，他依然站在地上，哪怕腿脚一直打着哆嗦，也没有再继续跪下来。
ref: Even so, he continues to force that shaky leg to remain standing in light of how awkward and funny he appears. If one had to describe his appearance, it would be like a duck squatting around after being tired out.
hyp: Even so, he remained standing on the ground, though his legs continued to tremble, he did not kneel down again.
rel_src: 火羽跪在地上，满脸是泪：“千错万错都是我的错，王后想打想骂，我绝无二话。”他将身后的竹条拿到手中，两掌相托，递到白颜面前，深深的低下了脑袋，一脸的视死如归。
似是察觉到竹条离手，火羽的身子僵住了，他紧紧的咬着牙关，等着那势如破竹般的一击。
rel_tgt: Fire Feather knelt on the ground, his face streaked with tears: "All the countless mistakes were mine, if the Queen wishes to strike or berate, I shall utter no complaint." He took the bamboo strip from behind him, holding it with both hands, presenting it before Bai Yan, and he bowed his head deeply, his expression one of resolute acceptance of his fate.
Seeming to sense the bamboo strip leaving his hand, Fire Feather's body stiffened. He clenched his jaw tightly, awaiting the impending blow with the force of splitting bamboo.
